Introduction

Yeo Hoon Min, best known as Hoon is a South Korean singer and actor. He is best known as a member of the South Korean boy group, U-KISS under NH Media. Hoon joined the group in February 2011 after the departure of two members. He made his debut as a member of U-KISS through the group's fifth mini album, "Bran New Kiss" on March 30th the same year. Before his debut in U-KISS, he was a solo ballad singer under his real name and released an extended play, "Pure & Love" on September 9, 2009.

Hoon has acted in several dramas including: “Athena: Goddess of War” (2010), “Beautiful Man” (2013), “Sweet Home, Sweet Honey” (2015), and “Unknown Woman” (2017).

On August 1, 2021 Hoon ended his contract with NH Media as he continued his solo activities.
